251 
 
  
EDUCATION AND ACCOUNTANCY  
  
AAUA  
ABSU  
AOCOE  
 BIU            
 EACOE                   
Two (2) ‘A’ level passes 
in Business  
Method and one (1) 
Social Science 
subject.  
  
As in Accountancy.  
  
As in Accountancy.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) EKSU and ABSU require 'A’ level or NCE merit in 
Accountancy plus a credit in Economics.  
(ii) EDALV accepts ND/NCE/HND at not less than lower 
credit in relevant studies plus the UTME requirements 
and accepts holders of  
(a) complete pass in the intermediate/CAN Examination or its 
equivalents.
